radiographic_examinations.findings: Bilateral hydronephrosis, bilateral solid ovarian masses (right ovary: 4.4 cm by 2.5 cm, left ovary: 5.6 cm by 4.5 cm), enlarged aortocaval lymph node (1.4 cm in diameter), and asymmetrically thickened bladder wall.
Heterogeneous myometrium, possible fibroid on the left side, and solid bilateral adnexal masses.
Solid left adnexal mass (4.2 cm by 4.8 cm) with invasion into the uterus, smaller right adnexal mass, and thickening of the bladder wall.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scans of the abdomen and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Marked shrinkage of the pelvic masses.

radiographic_examinations.date: Six months after beginning tamoxifen treatment
Slightly more than three years after beginning treatment
